HEADER.Title: Check the job status and logging

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS"
IF %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ) ELSE ( : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR ) @set retcode=%ERRORLEVEL% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 goto :retcode
:CASE "UNIX" execcode=$? if [ $execcode -eq 0 ] then : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO else : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR fi if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then exit $execcode fi :OTHER :ENDSWITCH
